DOC.brief_summary: . The aim of this study, thus, is to evaluate shunt fraction and markers of alveolar distress during one lung ventilation (OLV) at different levels of positive end expiratory pressure (PEEP). Moreover, investigators will focus on predicting factors of high shunt levels during OLV.
DOC.brief_title: Shunt Evaluation With ALPE System in Thoracic Surgery
